            EH&S Mission Statement     
            Environmental Health and Safety provides expertise to strengthen the culture of safety and responsibility across the campus community.     
            EH&S Vision Statement     
            To partner with the campus community in pursuit of environmental health and safety excellence with integrity, trust and teamwork.

 May is Heat Illness Prevention Month 
   
  Warmer weather has already started and temperatures are starting to rise in Riverside. Now more than ever, you should learn how to protect yourself and others from Heat Illness.  
 EH&S has curated resources to help keep you safe as the weather heats up! Please feel free to download, share and post the Infographics in your workplace! 
 UCR’s Heat Illness Written Program  
 Heat Illness eLearning Course  in the UCR Learning Center

            Air quality updates and wildfire smoke protection     
 
 Due to recent wildfire activity there is increased concern over air quality levels in Southern California. Refer to the current  Air Quality  levels for Riverside, CA. For more guidance and resources, review our  Wildfire Smoke webpage  and training. 
 
 
 
 
            Return To Work Protocols

 Return To Work Protocols 
 
 
 
 
            Request a Disinfectant Kit     
 
 Request a disinfectant kit from Facilities Services (includes disinfectant, painter’s tape, shop towels, and other items).

            Mercury thermometer exchange     
 
 Help UCR become Mercury Free! Exchange your mercury thermometer for FREE through EH&S. 
 Learn More. 
 
 
 
 
            Be Smart About Safety (BSAS)     
 
 The  Be Smart About Safety (BSAS)  program is designed to increase awareness of employee safety and reduce the number of employee injuries. Since the implementation of the BSAS program, UCR has been investing BSAS dollars into loss prevention and loss control activities across campus. 
 Learn More.
